message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. It's a great product, but I'm hoping to get a better price.  I'd be willing to pay $8,500 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $9,000.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $9,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. How about we settle on $8,750? It's a fair price for both of us, and we can finalize the deal.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $9,250.
